physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient has a history of previous cardiac surgeries for recurrent myxoma, with significant clinical features of Carney complex including recurrent mucosal tumors, spotty pigmentation, hirsutism, syndactyly of the toes, kyphosis, hyperthyroidism, and adenoma of the pituitary gland.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient underwent five cardiac surgeries for resection of cardiac myxoma at different locations, indicating a progression in the recurrence of myxomas.
